rules: Rule1: Provided that resources are allocated for the materials budget, then the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment.
Rule2: In the event that the research proposal has passed peer review, then if funding is approved for the research grant in the current quarter, resources are allocated for the materials budget.
Rule3: Whenever the lead researcher has valid credentials, they also have certified training.
Rule4: Given that the primary laboratory instruments are operational, then should the lead researcher have certified training, the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment.
Rule5: Either the primary laboratory instruments are operational or the backup system equipment is operational.
Rule6: Whenever the backup system equipment is operational, then if the lead researcher has certified training, the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment.
Rule7: In the event that the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment, it is not the case that the laboratory committee has approved the research proposal.
Rule8: Provided that the lead researcher has permission for laboratory access, then they have valid credentials.
Rule9: Under the condition that the lead researcher has permission for laboratory access, they have completed the safety protocol training.
Rule10: Given that the laboratory instruments are functional, then if the lead researcher has permission for laboratory access, the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment.

Rule11: In the event that temporary instruments are available as backup, then provided the lead researcher has permission for laboratory access, the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment.

Rule12: Should it not be the case that if the lead researcher has completed the safety protocol training, then the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment, then the lead researcher receives a warning from the administration.

Rule13: Under the condition that it is not true that if the lead researcher has completed the safety protocol training, then the laboratory team conducts research on the experiment, then the lead researcher does not receive a warning from the administration.

Rule14: Provided that it is not the case that either the laboratory instruments are functional or temporary instruments are available as backup, then the laboratory technician schedules maintenance for an emergency.
Rule15: In the event that the research proposal has not passed peer review, then revision is required for the research proposal.
Rule16: If the standard operating procedure is not active, then the laboratory committee has approved the research proposal.
Rule17: Provided that the standard operating procedure is not active, then the lead researcher has permission for laboratory access.
Rule18: Under the condition that the standard operating procedure is not active, then funding is approved for the research grant in the current quarter.
facts: Fact1: It is not the case that the research proposal requires revision.
Fact2: The laboratory technician does not schedule maintenance for an emergency.

question: The standard operating procedure is active.
